# Quick background

## PAM 

.big[
- The **Perceptual Assimilation Model** (PAM) models the acquisiton of L2 sound contrasts.
]

--

.big[
- In L2 acquisition, sounds are assimilated to L1 categories.
]

--

.big[
- Difficulty in the acquisiton of a new language contrast is based on how sounds are contrasted in the L1.
]

---

```{r}

data.frame("Assimilation_type" = c("Single Category", "Two Category"),
"Definition" = c("Two native categories correspond to two L2 categories", "Two native categories correspond to one L2 category"),
"Example" = c("/p/ and /b/ in Spanish and English", "Sheep-ship in L2 English by Spanish speakers")
) %>% 
  knitr::kable()

```
